trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur seeks a pair of burly biceps to do his bidding.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the culinary courier in Worlar's Echo.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_TODO_01<tab>Carry the stone box of foodstuffs to Garharlor.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Vuyargur.

TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>Good timing, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. With the brawniest of my kin otherwise occupied with construction, I would prevail upon your strength.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>Some time ago I sent a courier to fetch culinary supplies for the larder, but I suspect he may be too heavily encumbered.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_VUYARGUR_000_003<tab>If you could seek him out in Worlar's Echo, we would be most grateful for your helping hands.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_SHOKAFUI05356_000_005<tab>Are you here to help me? Oh, thank the ancestors.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_SHOKAFUI05356_000_006<tab>I was so giddy about the restoration of the larder, I went around telling everyone I could find, and they showered me in foodstuffs to bring back!

TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_SHOKAFUI05356_000_007<tab>It seems everyone's keen to see us complete the restoration of Zirgorteh the Open-armed, for I've been given another mountain of foodstuffs to bring back!

TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_SHOKAFUI05356_000_008<tab>Not to be ungrateful, but I can only carry about ten of these heavy stone boxes, and I'll need to walk slowly, lest I drop the whole stack down the mountain.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_SHOKAFUI05356_000_009<tab>Think you could deliver one to Garharlor over in Shelter? Your muscles may not thank you, but everyone else surely will!
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_SHOKAFUI05356_000_013<tab>Heavy, aren't they? You'll get the hang of it! Here, try again!
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_GARHARLOR_000_014<tab>How fares the culinary courier?
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>Collect the stone box of foodstuffs from the culinary courier and deliver it here to Garharlor.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_GARHARLOR_000_020<tab>Ah, this must be the delivery I requested. Much obliged.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_GARHARLOR_000_021<tab>Let's see here. Corn, beans, popotoes...and spices too!? Why, the box is stuffed to bursting!
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_GARHARLOR_000_022<tab>These are all pantry staples─ingredients commonly used in our most beloved Yok Huy soups. A generous offering indeed.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_GARHARLOR_000_023<tab>Mmm... Smell that? With this much sweet corn, no belly shall go unfilled.

TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_GARHARLOR_000_024<tab>Come to think of it, you weren't harassed by hungry alpacas on the road, were you? Perhaps we should be grateful that these stone boxes form an airtight seal...
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_GARHARLOR_000_025<tab>This looks to be tulidile jerky─the perfect staple for a larder, given its long shelf life.
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_GARHARLOR_000_026<tab>That said, I can't imagine something as delicious as jerky will go uneaten for long. Certainly not if I have the opportunity. <chuckle>
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_GARHARLOR_000_027<tab>Right then, that will be all I require of you. Speak to Vuyargur for your reward!
TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_GARHARLOR_000_028<tab>Go and collect your reward from Vuyargur. You've earned it, my friend!

TEXT_BANYOK121_05356_VUYARGUR_000_030<tab>Enjoyed some light exercise, did you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Rest those weary arms for as long as you like─but first, accept your reward with my thanks.
